root.name: Night Mission Pinball
root.description: OverviewNight Mission Pinball is a pinball game developed and published by subLOGIC for the Atari 8-Bit, Apple II, PC, and Commodore 64 platforms.GameplayNight Mission Pinball plays like a typical pinball simulation game. One of the features that Night Mission Pinball has is that the player can customize up to 38 aspects of how the game plays.Night Mission Pinball can be played from one player up to four players taking turns.
